entry.dcterms:description: The aim of the project is to collect information about the drog useage of a special population: the visitors of the Pepsi Island Festival
entry.dcterms:subject: drug abuse, alcohol and smoking
person
survey data
cross-section
The survey have been made by stratified sample of the two ticket type (daily and weekly). The simple random method of the semple selected by the code of the tickets.
